entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 1:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

Humidity: 48 %

Dewpoint: -37.6°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h gust 34 km/h

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
